long_description:
At Stanford Court it’s safe to say that we think the details matter. When you visit San Francisco you will see that there are details to be found on every building of every block (check out our Eco-Map for some of our favorite spots). From the French Gothic architecture of Grace Cathedral to the modern buildings of the Financial District, San Francisco is a city that draws you in.

 

At our hotel we believe that details big and small make a big impact on our guests. We purposefully pay attention to the little things. Sure, we have Autobahn wi-fi throughout the hotel that is super fast and a concierge that gives the best advice, but here are some of the super cool things we offer our guests:

 

Nod Hill– A variety of pillow types so you can sleep comfortably.

 

Live at the Lift – Music from the Bay Area greats playing in the elevators.

 

Snail Mail– Postcards in the room and a front desk that takes care of the postage, yep, we got it!

 

All of these little things matter so if you like what you see, share it! Tag us in your photos @StanfordCourtSF
